DOC.brief_summary: Employees work DSM workplace onsite Healthyroads Wellness® biometrics screen program offer opportunity blood fatty acid level , especially omega-3 fatty acid [ omega-3 index ] measure charge . At location , participant offer single coupon 90 day supply omega-3 capsule . Three month later , employee location give second opportunity blood omega-3 level [ eicosapentaenoic acid ( EPA ) docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) ] measure . The goal : 1 ) survey dietary EPA+DHA intake omega-3 blood level study population , 2 ) determine dietary EPA+DHA intake omega-3 blood level change people learn omega-3 index , 3 ) determine difference omega-3 index concentration detect 3 month later location receive information alone vs information+coupon .
DOC.brief_title: Cross-sectional Survey Omega-3 Fatty Acid Blood Levels
DOC.detailed_description: Email message poster announce onsite HealthyRoads Wellness biometric screen clinic inform ~1,800 DSM employee 19 location opportunity participate omega-3 research study blood omega-3 level measure . - Participants attend Healthyroads Wellness® biometrics screen clinic invite participate . If agree sign Informed Consent form , need complete Omega-3 Index Test Request form , write name , date birth collection date filter paper . The request form include dietary question fish/meat consumption . - Omega-3 research participant proceed biometric screen station blood obtain finger stick blood cholesterol measurement apply filter paper Healthyroads Wellness® professional . - The filter paper , Omega-3 Index Test Request , Informed Consent form staple together , package sample obtain location , ship DSM CLIA-approved laboratory . - Within week receive blood sample , Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendments ( CLIA ) -approved laboratory ( # 43D1105229 ) email Omega-3 Index Test result directly participant . Locations randomize approximately 50 % participant receive coupon discount 90 day supply omega-3 capsule . These coupon offer participant order determine rate coupon redemption . If coupon offer biometrics screen site , single coupon offer participant location . The coupon offer finger stick procedure incentive participation . Three-four month later , employee location offer second opportunity omega-3 index measure . The filter paper , Omega-3 Index Test Request , Informed Consent form staple together , package sample obtain location , ship DSM CLIA-approved laboratory . Based email address , birthdate , date collection , gender , data identify new participant second omega-3 index determination . This data allow anonymized comparison first versus second determination blood omega-3 index measurement ass impact provide participant information omega-3 status v information + coupon .
DOC.criteria: There exclusion criterion . These employee 18y age old .
